name: Protect My Flowers!
description:
This game was made in less than 2 days and was really just for practice and for fun, so don't take it seriously.

Those damn deer keep eating your flowers! WELL, NO MORE! This rifle will take care of those deer... but they keep coming, and coming, and coming!

Instructions:
1. Mouse to aim
2. P to pause
3. R to reload
4. DON'T LET THE DEER EAT YOUR FLOWERS!!!!!!
5. Left Click to shoot those damn deer
